column1: Little Goat Diner////We had a fabulous brunch today. I got the blue plate special which was just delicious. It was Ropa Blue Corn Cakes
column2: two corn cakes with pulled pork avocado
column6: and chunks of fruit. Attaching a picture. My friends really enjoyed their food and the atmosphere. Lots of light
column8: but not too bad. A 20 minute wait
column9: which passed by really fast with my Bloody Mary. Cute bar and bakery counter. Big time going back there
